results.title: Commonwealth Review. No. 21
results.brief_description: Cinemagazine containing the following items: Ice breakers at work in the Gulf of St Lawrence; Asian students in New Zealand under the Colombo Plan; Adventure training for girls at Kenya’s Outward Bound School; Commonwealth students assist with testing spectographic analysis machines; The centenary celebrations of the Ballygunge Cricket Club in Calcutta; The Commonwealth stand at the Schoolboy’s Exhibition in London.

results.title: Commonwealth Review. No. 15
results.brief_description: Cinemagazine containing the following items: Fishing under the ice in Canadian lakes; The visit of the Malaysian Welfare Officers to a Government Rehabilitation Centre in Britain; a Nigerian organist at Cambridge University; a Trinidad textile designer in London; The training of the staff of Radio Uganda; Horse racing throughout the Commonwealth, showing the training of jockeys and their mounts.

results.title: Commonwealth Review. No. 14
results.brief_description: Cinemagazine containing the following items: The newest independent state of the Commonwealth, Malawi; The Centre of Educational Television Overseas in London; Paper making in New Zealand; The Karachi flower show; The work of two British girls who are members of Voluntary Service Overseas, in Rhodesia; Water-skiing without skis in Australia and ice-yachting in Canada.

results.title: Commonwealth Review. No. 12
results.brief_description: Cinemagzine containing the following items: Surfboard riding off the coast of Australia; Trout hatcheries in Western Australia; Copper mining in Northern Rhodesia; The manufacture of oil-filled cables in Britain; A British tractor designed for use in the paddy fields of Ceylon; A football match between Ministers and Diplomats in Tanganyika; The building of a Maori meeting house in New Zealand and carnival day in the West Indies.

results.title: Commonwealth Review. No. 11
results.brief_description: Cinemagazine containing the following items: The construction of Britain’s new V.C.10 jet liner and its test flight to Ghana; the Amateur Boxing International in Dublin; Beekeeping in Australia; The Overseas Film School in Britain where students learn the techniques of film production; Art exhibitions in London by Indian children and Ceylonese adults; A gala concert given by the Ceylonese High Commissioner, Dr Malalesekera, in London; Motor racing on ice in Canada.

results.title: Commonwealth Review. No. 10
results.brief_description: Cinemagazine containing the following items: Commonwealth teams in action in the bobsleigh and ice hockey events of the Winter Olympic Games; Parliamentarians see Malaysia’s Rural Development Scheme; The natural asphalt of Trinidad and Tobago; Susan, a British circus elephant is also employed by a garage to move broken-down vehicles; Training in Occupational Therapy; The British tour of New Zealand Rugby Union Team.

results.title: Commonwealth Review. No. 09
results.brief_description: Cinemagazine containing the following items: Modernization of Pakistan’s fishing industry; Young people trek through the Rocky Mountains of Canada on horseback; Fire officers from Trinidad and Tobago watch British fire recruits training and the latest British fire-fighting equipment demonstrated; The pyretheum industry in Kenya; The opening of Television Malaysia; The opening to the public of President N’Kruma’s private zoo in Ghana.

results.title: Commonwealth Review. No. 05
results.brief_description: Cinemagazine containing the following items: Driving cattle to market in Northern Australia; Students from Nyasaland and Uganda study the art and science of forestry in England; Malaya diversifies her economy with the establishment of a new tyre factory; A Pakistan librarian staffs a travelling library in Britain; Wildlife in the Wanjie National Park in Rhodesia; A jetboat designed in New Zealand, built in Britain and tested in Canada.
